001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper;
002
003import com.comphenix.protocol.events.PacketEvent;
004import org.bukkit.event.block.BlockGrowEvent;
005import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
006import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException;
007
008public abstract class Feature<C> {
009    protected final DemeterPlugin plugin;
010    protected C config;
011
012    public Feature(DemeterPlugin plugin) {
013        this.plugin = plugin;
014    }
015
016    public DemeterPlugin plugin() { return plugin; }
017    public C config() { return config; }
018
019    public abstract String id();
020
021    public abstract void configure(ConfigurationNode config) throws SerializationException;
022    public abstract void enable();
023    public abstract void disable();
024
025    public void save(ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {}
026    public void load(ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {}
027
028    public void mapChunk(PacketEvent event) {}
029    public void lightUpdate(PacketEvent event) {}
030    public void blockGrow(BlockGrowEvent event) {}
031}
